channel.title: Computer Language Shootout
channel.description: Compare programming language performance on a few dozen flawed benchmarks and contribute faster more-elegant programs.

item.title: Scala programming language installed
item.description: Scala is now installed - please contribute faster more-elegant Scala programs for the benchmark problems. (See the "How can I help?" FAQ.)

item.title: SWI Prolog programming language installed
